title: Toshishita Joushi Wa Homeraretai
alternative_title: I Want to Be Praised By My Older Boss ; Toshishita Joushi wa Homeraretai ; Younger Boss Wants to be Praised ; 年下上司は褒められたい ; 年下上司渴望得到讚美 ; 年下上司渴望得到赞美
status: I Want to Be Praised By My Older Boss ; Toshishita Joushi wa Homeraretai ; Younger Boss Wants to be Praised ; 年下上司は褒められたい ; 年下上司渴望得到讚美 ; 年下上司渴望得到赞美
description:
Description :
        A soothing office love story that begins with two adults "complimenting each other" begins here!

"This is a suggestion to make work go more smoothly... Why don't we compliment each other?"

Kashiwagi is in his 30s and has just changed jobs to another industry. His instructor, Amemiya, an excellent younger boss, seems to feel a little uncomfortable working with him as an "older subordinate."
Kashiwagi is worried about his strained relationship with Amemiya and looks for an opportunity to talk to him at length, but it is difficult to catch him when he's busy.

One day after work, Kashiwagi happens to bump into Amemiya who is working overtime. In order to improve their relationship, he offers to help him, even if only a little...

What is the surprising suggestion that Amemiya, the younger boss who is not good at running around, tells him...?!
